paragraph1: I'm a passionate <highlight>Full-Stack Developer</highlight> based in Italy, driven by a love for crafting clean, efficient, and user-focused digital experiences.
paragraph2: With experience spanning both <highlight>frontend</highlight> and <highlight>backend</highlight> technologies, I enjoy tackling complex challenges and transforming ideas into functional, elegant solutions.
paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new frameworks, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
